blogPost.excerpt: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeap’s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
blogPost.body: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeap’s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
blogPost.title: Microsurvey Template Gallery by UserLeap - Get continuous insights with 75+ free microsurvey templates.
blogPost.author: Julie Chabin

localize.description: 用UserLeap的产品内微调查来收集和了解用户洞察力! 访问75个以上的免费微调查模板，每个模板都是由我们的用户研究团队设计的，并按照使用案例进行分类，这样你就可以快速得到你最重要的产品问题的答案。
localize.tagline: 通过75+免费的微调查模板获得持续的洞察力。

localize.description: 用UserLeap的產品內微調查來收集和了解用戶洞察力! 訪問75個以上的免費微調查模板，每個模板都是由我們的用戶研究團隊設計的，並按照使用案例進行分類，這樣你就可以快速得到你最重要的產品問題的答案。
localize.tagline: 通過75+免費的微調查模板獲得持續的洞察力。
